item.title: A cosmetic ‘anti-ageing’ product improves photoaged skin: a double-blind, randomized controlled trial
A study of prisoners and guards in a simulated prison
item.description: The famous Stanford Prison Experiment (SPE). Debuked by: texier2019 The Stanford Prison Experiment was massively influential. We just learned it was a fraud. Reference Philip Zimbardo, Craig Haney, Curtis Banks, E Aronson “A study of prisoners and guards in a simulated prison” (1973) Bib @Article{zimbardo1973, title = {A study of prisoners and guards in a simulated prison}, author = {Zimbardo, Philip and Haney, Craig and Banks, Curtis and Aronson, E}, year = {1973}, custom-url-pdf = {https://www.simplypsychology.org/wp-content/uploads/zimbardo-paper.pdf} }
